name: iPhone 13 Pro
details: The iPhone 13 Pro is the latest flagship smartphone from Apple, featuring a powerful A15 Bionic chip, a ProMotion display for smooth scrolling, and a versatile triple-lens camera system.

name: The Great Gatsby
details: F. Scott Fitzgerald's masterpiece explores themes of decadence, idealism, and excess.

name: Eames Lounge Chair
details: The Eames Lounge Chair is an iconic piece of mid-century modern furniture known for its timeless design, premium leather upholstery, and comfortable rosewood veneer shell.

name: Classic Denim Jeans
details: A timeless addition to your wardrobe, these classic denim jeans offer both style and comfort.

name: Samsung QLED TV
details: Experience stunning visuals and smart features with the Samsung 4K QLED TV.

name: Google Pixel 6 Pro
details: The Google Pixel 6 Pro is Google's flagship smartphone, known for its stunning OLED display, advanced camera system, and the stock Android experience.

name: IKEA MALM Dresser
details: The MALM Dresser from IKEA combines style and functionality in your bedroom.

name: Women's Leather Jacket
details: This leather jacket is a stylish addition to your wardrobe, offering a bold and edgy look.

name: Sony Noise-Canceling Headphones
details: Enjoy an immersive audio experience with these Sony Noise-Canceling Headphones.

name: OnePlus 9 Pro
details: The OnePlus 9 Pro delivers high-end performance and photography capabilities.

name: To Kill a Mockingbird
details: Harper Lee's classic novel 'To Kill a Mockingbird' is a Pulitzer Prize-winning masterpiece that tells a powerful coming-of-age story while addressing themes of racial injustice and moral growth in the American South.

name: Levi's 501 Jeans
details: Levi's 501 Jeans are a classic in the world of denim fashion, known for their timeless style, comfortable straight leg fit, and iconic button fly closure.

name: Canon EOS R6 Mirrorless Camera
details: The Canon EOS R6 is a high-performance mirrorless camera featuring a 20.1-megapixel full-frame sensor, 4K UHD video recording, in-body image stabilization, and advanced Dual Pixel CMOS AF II. It also offers seamless connectivity with built-in Wi-Fi and Bluetooth.

name: Herman Miller Aeron Chair
details: The Herman Miller Aeron Chair is an ergonomic masterpiece, featuring a mesh back for breathability, adjustable lumbar support, and a highly customizable design for a comfortable and productive workspace.

name: Nike Air Max 90
features: Visible Air unit in the sole
details: The Nike Air Max 90 is a classic sneaker with an iconic design, featuring a visible Air unit in the sole, a comfortable leather and mesh upper, and versatile style for everyday wear.

name: Apple MacBook Pro
details: The Apple MacBook Pro 16 is a powerhouse laptop with a stunning 16-inch Retina display, the latest M1 Pro or Max chip, a comfortable Magic Keyboard, and all-day battery life for professionals and creatives.

name: Samsung Galaxy S22
details: The Samsung Galaxy S22 Ultra is a top-tier smartphone with a 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED display, a versatile quad-camera system, S Pen support, and powerful 5G connectivity for a premium mobile experience.

name: The DA Vinci Code
details: Dan Drown's 'The Catcher in the Rye' is a classic coming-of-age novel that follows the narrative of Holden Caulfield and explores the theme of teenage rebellion.
